item.title: Rawlings Recalls Catcher’s Helmets Due to Risk of Head Injury
item.description: The back plate of the catcher’s helmet can fail to protect the player, posing a risk of head injury to the user.

item.title: Sun Organic Recalls Wintergreen Essential Oils Due to Failure to Meet Child Resistant Packaging Requirements; Risk of Poisoning
item.description: The product contains the substance methyl salicylate, which must be in child resistant packaging as required by the Poison Prevention Packaging Act (PPPA).  The packaging of the product is not child resistant, posing a poisoning risk if the contents are swallowed by young children.

item.title: Star Water Systems Recalls Sump Pumps Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The sump pumps can overheat, posing a risk of fire.

item.title: Juratoys Recalls Bead Maze Toys Due to Choking Hazard
item.description: The wooden triangle shape piece fails to meet the mandatory federal standard for small parts, posing a choking hazard to young children.

item.title: Country Home Products Recalls DR Walk Behind Leaf Blowers Due to Projectile Hazard
item.description: The blades inside the leaf blower can break off and discharge from the unit, posing a  projectile hazard to the user or bystanders.

item.title: Polaris Recalls Pro XD Utility Vehicles Due to Collision and Crash Hazards (Recall Alert)
item.description: The rear brake line can become puncutured causing the rear brakes to fail, posing a collision and crash hazard to the rider.

item.title: Bobcat Company Recalls Utility Vehicles (UTVs) Due to Collision and Crash Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The rear brake line can become punctured causing the brakes to fail, posing a collision and crash hazard.

item.title: K-Apparel Recalls Children’s Lounge Pants Due to Violation of Federal Flammability Standard; Burn Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The children’s lounge pants fail to meet the flammability standard for children’s sleepwear that requires sleepwear to be either snug-fitting or flame resistant, posing a risk of burn injuries to children.

item.title: Polaris Recalls Brutus Utility Vehicles (UTVs) Due to Collision and Crash Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The rear brake line can become punctured causing the brakes to fail, posing a collision and crash hazard.

item.title: Pier 1 Recalls Desk Chairs Due to Fall and Injury Hazards
item.description: The chair’s legs can break, posing fall and injury hazards.

item.title: Summer Infant Recalls SwaddleMe By Your Bed Inclined Sleepers to Prevent Risk of Suffocation
item.description: Infant fatalities have been reported with other manufacturers’ inclined sleep products, after the infants rolled from their back to their stomach or side, or under other circumstances.

item.title: Graco Recalls Little Lounger Rocking Seats to Prevent Risk of Suffocation
item.description: Infant fatalities have been reported with other manufacturers’ inclined sleep products, after infants rolled from their back to their stomach or side, or under other circumstances.

item.title: Evenflo Recalls Pillo Portable Napper Inclined Sleepers to Prevent Risk of Suffocation
item.description: Infant fatalities have been reported with other manufacturers’ inclined sleep products, after the infants rolled from their back to their stomach or side, or under other circumstances.

item.title: Delta Enterprise Corp. Recalls Incline Sleeper with Adjustable Feeding Position for Newborns to Prevent Risk of Suffocation
item.description: Infant fatalities have been reported with other manufacturers’ inclined sleep products, after the infants rolled from their back to their stomach or side, or under other circumstances.

item.title: PCNA Recalls Power Banks Due to Fire and Burn Hazards
item.description: The power bank’s lithium-ion battery can overheat and ignite, posing fire and burn hazards.

item.title: STIHL Recalls Pressure Washers Due to Injury Hazard
item.description: The pressure washer nozzle can disconnect from the spray wand when under pressure during use, posing an injury hazard.

item.title: Varidesk Recalls Stand2Learn Stools Due to Fall Hazard
item.description: The foot support on the stool was improperly welded and can break, posing a fall hazard to consumers.

item.title: Baby Trend Recalls Tango Mini Strollers Due to Fall Hazard
item.description: Both of the stroller’s hinge joints can release and collapse under pressure, posing a fall hazard to children in the stroller.

item.title: The Thompson’s Company Recalls Aerosol Waterproofing Wood and Masonry Protectors Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The contents of the cans can react with the package, causing rust to form along the can seam, which could spread to other areas of the can and create pinhole leaks.  Leaking propellant poses a fire hazard when it comes into contact with sources of ignition.  Leaking sealer can also result in property damage.

item.title: Libbey Glass Recalls Milk Bottles Due to Laceration Hazard
item.description: The bottles can break unexpectedly during use, posing a laceration hazard.

item.title: Thesaurus Global Marketing Recalls Tricycles Due to Violation of the Federal Lead Paint Ban; Risk of Poisoning; Sold Exclusively at Amazon.com (Recall Alert)
item.description: Paint on the canopy’s frame contains levels of lead that exceed the federal lead paint ban and tricycle components contain levels of lead that exceed the federal lead content ban.  Lead is toxic if ingested by young children and can cause adverse health issues.

item.title: Boston Warehouse Trading Corp. Recalls Holiday Travel Mugs Due to Fire Hazard; Sold Exclusively at Meijer Stores
item.description: The mugs are mislabeled as microwave safe.  If microwaved, the metallic print on the mug can spark, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Hallmark Recalls Candles Due to Fire and Laceration Hazards
item.description: When the candle is lit, the glass jar can break, posing fire and laceration hazards.

item.title: Bosch Thermotechnology Recalls Buderus Boilers Due to Carbon Monoxide Poisoning Hazard
item.description: The siphon can become blocked, leading to a delayed ignition that can damage the boiler’s exhaust system, creating a carbon monoxide hazard.

item.title: Toysmith Recalls Light-Up Magic Wands Due to Choking and Ingestion Hazards
item.description: The battery cover can detach and expose the button-cell batteries, posing choking and ingestion hazards to young children.

item.title: BCI Burke Recalls Merge Playground Climbers Due to Entrapment Hazard
item.description: A welded rung opening on the sides of the climber poses an entrapment hazard to children.

item.title: Hillsdale Furniture Recalls Five-Drawer Chests Due to Tip-Over and Entrapment Hazards
item.description: The chests are unstable and can tip over if not anchored to the wall, posing serious tip-over and entrapment hazards that can result in death or injuries to children.  The chests do not comply with the performance requirements of the U.S. voluntary industry standard (ASTM F2057-17).

item.title: J. Crew Recalls Boys’ Denim Pants Due to Aspiration and Choking Hazards
item.description: Small stones can be present in the pockets or waistband of the pants from the stone washing manufacturing process, posing aspiration or choking hazards to young children.

item.title: Profile Design Recalls Bicycle Carbon Aerobars Due to Crash Hazard
item.description: The bicycle aerobars can crack and break, causing the rider to lose control and crash.

item.title: Bass Pro Recalls MR. STEAK™ Gas Grills Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The gas regulator hose with attached fuel gauge can melt if it comes in contact with the bottom of the grill’s firebox, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: WilliamsRDM Recalls Cooktop Fire Suppressors Due to Risk of Failure to Activate and Suppress Fires
item.description: The StoveTop FireStop (STFS) Rangehood and Microhood Automatic Cooktop Fire Suppressors can fail to activate the sealed openings that allow the suppressant powder to feed out of the canister and suppress the fire.

item.title: Surly Bikes Recalls Bicycle Racks Due to Crash and Injury Hazards
item.description: The recalled front bicycle rack can loosen and contact the front wheel, posing crash and injury hazards to the rider.

item.title: Trek Recalls Super Commuter+ Electric Bicycles Due to Fall Hazard
item.description: The front fender bolt can unthread causing the wheel to detach from the bicycle, posing a fall hazard to the rider.

item.title: DaVinci Recalls Bassinets Due to Fall Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The bassinet’s support legs can break, posing a fall hazard to babies.

item.title: Stanley Black & Decker Recalls Wooden Handle Nailing Hammer Due to Injury Hazard
item.description: The molded grip on the hammer can come loose, posing an injury hazard to consumers.

item.title: Yamaha Recalls Portable Generators Due to Fire and Burn Hazards (Recall Alert)
item.description: The portable generator’s fuel tank can leak gasoline, posing fire and burn hazards.

item.title: Recalled Products Sold by T.J. Maxx, Marshalls and HomeGoods After Recalls Were Announced
item.description: Hazards include infant fatalities, fire, burn, choking, fall, laceration, skin irritation, explosion or other injuries depending on the product.

item.title: Mark Feldstein & Associates Recalls Stacked Gourd Jack-O-Lantern Decorations Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The string light wiring inside of the Jack-O-Lanterns can overheat, spark or ignite, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: RESURRECTIONbeauty Recalls Wintergreen Essential Oil Due to Failure to Meet Child Resistant Packaging Requirement; Risk of Poisoning (Recall Alert)
item.description: The product contains the substance methyl salicylate, which must be in child resistant packaging as required by the Poison Prevention Packaging Act (PPPA). The packaging of the product is not child resistant, posing a poisoning risk if the contents are swallowed by young children.

item.title: SCARPA North America Recalls Ski Boots Due to Fall Hazard
item.description: The ski boot shell can crack, posing a fall hazard and risk of injury to the consumer.
